testcase.classname: Registration page should restrict password usage to a secure and high level passcode
testcase.name: There should be at least one lowercase char for stronger password and see the level chart change accordingly
testcase.system-out: Given User go to the GMi Bank home page.....................................passed And User click on user icon.................................................passed And User click on the registration menu.....................................passed And Click on New Password textbox...........................................passed Then Assert that strenght bar is red........................................passed And Enter a password with one uppercase letter..............................passed And Observe that strenght bar is yellow.....................................passed And Enter one lowercase letter to password test box.........................passed And Strength Bar must be green..............................................passed And Click on password confirmation textbox..................................passed Then Copy new password text box value to new password confirmation texbox...passed
